Name: Statuette of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris
Description: Representation of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris in the shape of a mummy mounted on a pedestal. The god is wearing a close-fitting tunic of a red colour and there is a vertical inscription on the front, the signs of which, in black, have all but disappeared. The face is green and the collar is yellow and green in colour. The crown is lost. The cavity of the pedestal, which was meant to harbour fragments of the Book of the Dead, is closed off by the figure of a falcon.
